top.title: Clintons agree to testify on Epstein as vote looms to hold them in contempt of Congress
top.summary: The couple bows to the House Oversight Committee's demands after arguing for months that its subpoenas were invalid.

top.title: Paris prosecutors raid France offices of Elon Musk's X
top.summary: The raid, involving cyber-crime officers, represents a dramatic escalation of an investigation that began in January 2025.

top.title: Russian hits Ukraine energy sites in 'most powerful blow' so far this year
top.summary: The attack - which reportedly consisted of more than 70 missiles and 450 drones - comes after a so-called "energy truce" expired at the weekend.

top.title: Paris prosecutors raid France offices of Elon Musk's X
top.summary: The raid, involving cyber-crime officers, represents a dramatic escalation of an investigation that began in January 2025.

top.title: Musk's SpaceX and xAI merge to make world's most valuable private company
top.summary: Musk says the combined firm - which has been valued at more than $1tn - will be an "innovation engine".

top.title: China bans hidden car door handles over safety concerns
top.summary: It makes China the first country to stop the use of designs first made popular by Elon Musk's Tesla.

title.#text: Aluminium: Why Google’s Android for PC launch may be messy and controversial
YouTube now blocking background playback on mobile browsers
